name: Pacman3D 1st Person [Windows/Android]
description:
The new Pacman3D 1st person is released.  Three levels to begin with but may add more in the future. Collect the pixels to advance an avoid the ghosts that get harder to avoid with each level.

The world is so scary through the eyes of Pacman.
Android version is now available.

YouTube: Fellowplayer
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXzcduiD99hcDMhhCzByRiA

WASD to move
'E' or click buttons to Start game / Continue
'Space' Jump
